WorkflowInfo.Name: Create users passwords expiration report
WorkflowInfo.Description: Create users passwords expiration report and send it to the administrator.
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process checks how many days left there are for every user in a specific OU, and sends a report to the administrator. This process can avoid unnecessary calls to the help-desk, and can also be combined with another automatic process that resets the user password in case of expiration / forgotten password.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ADListOU;Assembly=ADListOU, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ADPassExpDaysLeft;Assembly=ADPassExpDaysLeft, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="Users Passwords Status" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="UsersPasswordReport" x:Name="CreateReport" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /><ns1:ADListOU IsValid="True" x:Name="adListOU1" HostName="AD-Server" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:00:00" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="AD List OU" Recursive="True" Path="\Users" Password="" OUName="" Description="Active directory List OU." HostId="-2" TypeName="ADListOU" UserName="" /><ns2:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="GetUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%adListOU1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="type = 'User'" /><ns3:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="TotalUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%GetUsers%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="GetUsers" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%TotalUsers%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="UserName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%GetUsers%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="GetUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns7:ADPassExpDaysLeft IsValid="True" Days="20" ADUserName="%UserName%" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="adPassExpDaysLeft1" Timeout="00:00:00" HostName="AD-Server" DisplayName="AD Password Expiration Days Left" Path="DC=Ayehu,DC=COM" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Active directory returns the number of days left before password expired." HostId="-2" TypeName="ADPassExpDaysLeft" UserName="" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="Check_Result"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="within_14_days"><ns8:ReturnValue Value="14" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="<=" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& <= 14" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="%UserName% - Password will expire in %adPassExpDaysLeft1% days" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="True" VariableName="UsersPasswordReport" x:Name="UpdateReport1" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="more_than_14_days"><ns8:ReturnValue Value="14" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType=">" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& > 14" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns9:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="password_expired"><ns8:ReturnValue Value="Password expired" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","Password expired")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="%UserName% - Password expired" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="True" VariableName="UsersPasswordReport" x:Name="UpdateReport2" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Users Passwords expiration report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">%UsersPasswordReport% </BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
